A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: TLJ had tons of potential\, and had an opportunity to move a character along. But decided to go Mary Poppins. Both unrealistic and unbelievable even for the Sci-Fi world. Unfortunately this happened way to early in the movie\, ruining the rest of the movie for me. About 50% of the movie was GREAT and worthy of Star Wars the other\, well..
